Row.Text: Armorer

+4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Exploration Military Building. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
Exploration Military Building. Military Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Land Units.
Bank
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Quarters. Exploration Gold Building.
+1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Quarters. Exploration Gold Building.
Bazaar
+3[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Exploration Gold Building.
Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 1. Exploration Gold Building.
Dungeon
+2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence and +3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Exploration Diplomacy and Production Building.
Exploration Diplomacy and Production Building.
Gristmill
+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on a River.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations. Warehouse Food Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on a River.
Guildhall
+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Exploration Gold and Diplomacy Building.
Exploration Gold and Diplomacy Building.
Hospital
+5[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +15% Growth Rate. Exploration Food Building.
+15% Growth Rate. Exploration Food Building.
Kiln
+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonders. Exploration Culture Building.
+10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Wonders. Exploration Culture Building.
Medieval Bridge

+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River.
Allows Land Units to move over a Navigable River without having to Embark. Cheaper to build where a Road has already formed a Ferry across the River. Must be placed on a Navigable River.
Medieval Walls

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Exploration Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.

Adds 100 HP to the District and +15 Combat Strength to Units defending in the tile. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement. Exploration Fortification. Must be built adjacent to another Fortified District. Can be purchased in Towns only on the Town Center.
Menagerie
+5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Camps and Pastures. Exploration Happiness Building.
+1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Camps and Pastures. Exploration Happiness Building.
Observatory
+4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Exploration Science Building.
Exploration Science Building.
Pavilion
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Exploration Culture Building.
+1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Exploration Culture Building.
Sawmill

+3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Camps and Woodcutters. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on a River.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Camps and Woodcutters. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns. Must be placed on a River.
Shipyard

+5[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. Exploration Military Building. Naval Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units.

Exploration Military Building. Naval Units trained in this Settlement will spawn at this Building's location. Must be placed on Coast adjacent to land. +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units.
Stonecutter
+3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines and Quarries. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Mines and Quarries. Warehouse Production Building. Ageless. Buildable in all Ages. Can be purchased in Towns.
Inn
+3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Exploration Food and Happiness Building.
Exploration Food and Happiness Building.
Temple
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Has 1 Relic slot. Allows the creation of Missionary Units in this Settlement. Exploration Happiness Building. Can be purchased in Towns.
Has 1 Relic slot. Allows the creation of Missionary Units in this Settlement. Exploration Happiness Building. Can be purchased in Towns.
University
+5[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters. Exploration Science Building.
+1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters. Exploration Science Building.
Wharf
+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2. Exploration Food Building. Must be placed on Coast or a Navigable River.
Increases the number of Resources that may be assigned to this Settlement by 2. Exploration Food Building. Must be placed on Coast or a Navigable River.
Madrasa
+5[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for Quarters, Science Buildings, and Wonders. Abbasid Unique Science Building. Ageless.
Abbasid Unique Science Building. Ageless.
Mosque

+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Happiness Buildings and Wonders. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Culture Buildings and Wonders. Unlocks the ability to found a Religion. Abbasid Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Unlocks the ability to found a Religion. Abbasid Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Anjuvannam

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Coastal Terrain, Navigable Rivers, and Wonders. +50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units. Chola Unique Gold and Military Building. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
+50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units. Chola Unique Gold and Military Building. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
+50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units.
Manigramam

+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Gold Buildings and Wonders. Chola Unique Happiness Building. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
Chola Unique Happiness Building. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
Candi Bentar
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Coastal Terrain, Navigable Rivers, and Wonders. Majapahit Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Majapahit Unique Culture Building. Ageless.
Meru

+5[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Mountains and Wonders. +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Natural Wonders. Majapahit Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Natural Wonders. Majapahit Unique Happiness Building. Ageless.
Bailey

+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Medieval Walls and Wonders. Norman Unique Culture Building and Fortification. Ageless. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.
Norman Unique Culture Building and Fortification. Ageless. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.
Motte

+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if placed on Rough Terrain.[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness adjacency for Wonders. Norman Unique Happiness Building and Fortification. Ageless. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if placed on Rough Terrain. Norman Unique Happiness Building and Fortification. Ageless. All Fortified Districts must be conquered to capture a Settlement.
Casa Consistorial
+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for Quarters and Wonders. Spanish Unique Culture Building. Ageless. Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.
Spanish Unique Culture Building. Ageless. Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.
Casa de Contratación
+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Navigable Rivers, Resources, and Wonders. Spanish Unique Gold Building. Ageless. Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.
Spanish Unique Gold Building. Ageless. Must be built in the Homelands adjacent to Coast.
Caravanserai

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Navigable Rivers and Resources. Songhai Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be built on an existing Improvement on Desert or Plains.
Songhai Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be built on an existing Improvement on Desert or Plains.
Lo'i Kalo

+3[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and +2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each adjacent Farm. Hawaiian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Grassland or Tropical.
Hawaiian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Grassland or Tropical.
Ming Great Wall

+5[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Fortification Buildings and Improvements. Ming Unique Improvement. Ageless. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.

Ming Unique Improvement. Ageless. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Can only be built in a line and must be placed on an existing Improvement. Cannot branch or fork.
Expedition Base
Örtöö

+5[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. Restores movement to any Mongol Unit at its location. Mongolian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed on Rough, River, or a tile with a Feature.

Restores movement to any Mongol Unit at its location. Mongolian Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed on Rough, River, or a tile with a Feature.
Terrace Farm

+4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food. +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for Buildings. Incan Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Rough Terrain without a River or Feature.
Gold Adjacency for Buildings. Incan Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Rough Terrain without a River or Feature.
Kasbah

+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE]Culture, [icon:YIELD_GOLD]Gold, and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE]Science. City State Unique Improvement. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Desert.
City State Unique Improvement. Counts as Fortification, +6 Combat Strength when defending. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on Desert.
Stone Head

+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every adjacent Stone Head. City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.
City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement on tiles with a natural Happiness yield.
Company Post

+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in Distant Lands. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold if there is at least one Resource assigned to this Settlement. City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Company Post.

+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in Distant Lands. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold if there is at least one Resource assigned to this Settlement. City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to another Company Post.
Monastery

+4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if this Settlement follows your Religion. City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to a District

+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness if this Settlement follows your Religion. City State Unique Improvement. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on an existing Improvement, and cannot be placed adjacent to a District.
Donjon

Norman Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Bailey and Motte in the same District. +10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Cavalry units. Receive a free Chevaler Unit when completed.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Cavalry units. Receive a free Chevaler Unit when completed.
Ulema
Abbasid Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Madrasa and Mosque in the same District. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to all Specialists in this City.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to all Specialists in this City.
Plaza
Spanish Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Casa Consistorial and Casa de Contratación in the same District. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in this Settlement for every Settlement in Distant Lands.
+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in this Settlement for every Settlement in Distant Lands.
Pura
Majapahit Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Candi Bentar and Meru in the same District. +10%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a Town to a City. Receive 1 Relic when completed.
+10%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards converting a Town to a City. Receive 1 Relic when completed.
Five Hundred Lords
Chola Unique Quarter. Created by constructing the Anjuvannam and Manigramam in the same District. +5 Land Trade Route range and +15 Naval Trade Route range.
+5 Land Trade Route range and +15 Naval Trade Route range.
Borobudur
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Quarters. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to Coast.
Food from Borobudur.
Happiness from Borobudur.
Brihadeeswarar Temple
+3[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. All Buildings gain a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Navigable River or on a Minor River.
All Buildings gain a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Navigable Rivers. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Navigable River or on a Minor River.
El Escorial
+3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. Has 3 Relic slots. +1 Settlement Limit. +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Cities within 7 tiles of this Wonder. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Has 3 Relic slots. +1 Settlement Limit. +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Cities within 7 tiles of this Wonder. Ageless. Must be placed on Rough Terrain.
Erdene Zuu
+4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Creating a Cavalry Unit grants[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its cost. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Desert, Plains, or Tundra.
Creating a Cavalry Unit grants[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its cost. Ageless. Must be placed on Flat Desert, Plains, or Tundra.
Forbidden City
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on all Fortification Buildings in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on all Fortification Buildings in this Settlement. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Hale o Keawe

+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Constructing a Building on Coast Terrain grants[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% of its cost. Has 3 Relic slots. Ageless. Must be adjacent to Coast, but not adjacent to Tundra.
Constructing a Building on Coast Terrain grants[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% of its cost. Has 3 Relic slots. Ageless. Must be adjacent to Coast, but not adjacent to Tundra.
House of Wisdom
+3[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. Gain 3 Relics. Has 3 Relic slots. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from Great Works. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Gain 3 Relics. Has 3 Relic slots. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from Great Works. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a District.
Machu Pikchu

+4[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on all Buildings adjacent to this Wonder. Ageless. Must be placed on a Tropical Mountain.
+2 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on all Buildings adjacent to this Wonder. Ageless. Must be placed on a Tropical Mountain.
Notre Dame

+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. When in a Celebration all Specialists provide +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Start a Celebration immediately after constructing this Wonder. Ageless. Must be adjacent to a River and a District.
When in a Celebration all Specialists provide +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Start a Celebration immediately after constructing this Wonder. Ageless. Must be adjacent to a River and a District.
From Notre Dame.
Shwedagon Zedi Daw

+4[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on all Rural tiles in this Settlement that have at least 1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 Wildcard Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Lake.
+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on all Rural tiles in this Settlement that have at least 1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +1 Wildcard Attribute Point. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a Lake.
Tomb of Askia

+2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold. +2 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in this Settlement for every Resource assigned to it. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert.
+2 Resource Capacity in this Settlement. +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in this Settlement for every Resource assigned to it. Ageless. Must be placed on Desert.
White Tower
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness. +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement for every Tradition slotted in the Government. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a City Hall.
+4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in this Settlement for every Tradition slotted in the Government. Ageless. Must be placed adjacent to a City Hall.
